body: @wqyfavor 如果是服务端的问题，为啥PC浏览器上能连上呢？
最终发现是由于使用了:style="{paddingTop=isIphoneX?30px:10px}"的原因，不要使用:style，使用:class代替，就解决了头部抖动的问题
me too
我觉得和 #2275 应该是一个问题
@HaloZhou `weex studio IDE`只支持IDE自己创建的项目，两个工具项目存在配置上的差异，不能一起使用。

> @HaloZhou `weex studio IDE`只支持IDE自己创建的项目，两个工具项目存在配置上的差异，不能一起使用。

那假设我按照现在这种方式，该怎么做？求教

We release the versions: 0.24.0 0.20.0 0.19.0 0.12.0. Other release version we have already removed.

The document: https://weex.apache.org/download/download.html
测试机型有华为 oppo vivo，均不同概率出现了点击延迟

@HaloZhou 
可以尝试使用IDE创建项目 -> 替换`src`内容为你原来项目`src`，不行的话就只能靠你自己看代码改了

The PR is not merged because the building procedure cost too much time.
Closed by #2545

As mentioned in [document](https://weex.apache.org/docs/components/web.html#summary)

> web is only used as a degraded unconventional scenario and is not recommended for a large number of normal Weex pages.

But if you have a PR to fix the problem, I will be happy to review and merge it.
Fixed by #2545

The log is pretty straightforward. 

> "/data/data/com.cztech.jdyw/files/libweexcorebk1.so" is 32-bit instead of 64-bit

We are working on 64 bit supporting, but Weex only supports 32 bit now. Ref #2389 to see time schedule of 64 bit supporting. We will announce it in the [mail list](https://weex.apache.org/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#mailing-list) as well.
As Android Q is [done](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/pull/2336),  and will be published in next release.
